title: IPL 2022 auction: Chameera and Theekshana sold
content: Sri Lankans Dushmantha Chameera and Maheesh Theekshana have been sold in the Indian Premier League 2022 auction.Fast bowler Chameera was today (13) drafted for Indian Rs. 20 million by Lucknow Super Giants.Spinner Theekshana has been picked for Indian Rs. 70 lakh by Chennai Super Kings.Wanindu Hasaranga yesterday became the most expensive Sri Lankan player sold in IPL after he was sold to Royal Challengers Bangalore for Indian Rs. 107.5 million.
